# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="1a4da-102">Dodavanje zastavice i podsetnike u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a4da-103">Da biste postavili ili uredite podsetnik za događaj:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-104">Idi na [Kalendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-105">Izaberite željeni događaj će se oglasiti o, a zatim izaberite na strelice u gornjem desnom uglu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-106">da biste je proširili.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-107">Pored **podsetite me**, odaberite vreme podsetnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="1a4da-108">Outlook.com automatski čuva promene.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1a4da-109">Da biste se podsetili da pratite poruku, možete dodati zastavicu za praćenje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-110">Idi na [poštu](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-111">U listi poruka, zadržite pokazivač iznad poruke da vidite opciju zastavu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-112">Izaberite ikonu zastavice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-113">Označi poruku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1a4da-114">Da biste videli sve poruke označene zastavicom, potvrdite izbor u polju za potvrdu u levom donjem uglu stranice da ide na zadatke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="1a4da-115">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte [Zastavica ili pin poruku u Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1a4da-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
